Title: Fight or Flight

Actors: Laura Linney, Oliver Platt, Gabriel Basso, John Benjamin Hickey
Plot: In her day life, Cathy runs into Dr. Sherman and his much younger second wife, Gia, who invites Cathy and Paul over for dinner. Not wanting to offend the person who is potentially saving ...
